text: Angie is a 1994 American romantic comedy-drama movie. The movie is about the title character, whom some people have troubles understanding. Geena Davis plays the title character. Aida Turturro plays Tina, and James Gandolfini plays Vinnie. The movie received mixed reviews. It didn't make much money. title: Angie (movie)
